channel.title: Personal Projects on Vivian Leung
channel.description: Recent content in Personal Projects on Vivian Leung

item.title: Logseq plugins
item.description: About I develop plugins to enhance the overall user experience for Logseq, an open-source personal knowledge management system and note-taking application.

item.title: 3D Modeling and Animation
item.description: About I modeled and animated 3D objects using Blender, an open-source 3D computer graphics software.

item.title: FlowPomoTimer
item.description: About I created a timer called FlowPomoTimer so that I can 1) keep track of how long I’ve been working on a task and 2) get notified at certain intervals so that I don’t lose track of time.

item.title: Mac Apps
item.description: About As a Mac user, I enjoy exploring apps that help me become more productive or bring value to my everyday life.
